author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
Opening as draft for now:
 - Added a new `SimBeamSpotHLLHC` CondFormat and relative record
    - Also added all the needed utilities to write/read/plot/inspect the new object
 - A better PR description will come soon
 - For now I just want to test that the updates I made to `HLLHCEvtVtxGenerator` did not change its behavior

Any feedback is welcome (@mmusich  )

#### PR validation:
Code compiles and I ran successfully a few upgrade workflows.

#### Backport:
Not a backport, no backport needed.
title: Add new SimBeamSpotHLLHC CondFormat
